basics.name: Juan Ortega
basics.label: Ph.D. Student in Engineering Sciences
basics.summary: Doctoral researcher at The Hidden Heart Lab (PUC), specializing in the intersection of Computational Mechanics and Scientific Machine Learning (PINNs) for cardiovascular applications.

work.name: The Hidden Heart Lab (PUC)
work.summary: Research under the supervision of Dr. Francisco Sahli Costabal.
highlights: Development of computational models for cardiac electrophysiology.
Implementation of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) using JAX.
Numerical resolution of the Isotropic Eikonal equation.
